text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, is it that time already? Special<n>Week, I'm headingâ€”

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Inhale... exhale... All righty!SUZUKA!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Y-yes?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Is it okay if I go running with you?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Sure! ...Huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
All righty! All done stretching! Let's<n>hurry up and run,
Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Seeing as we're here together, why<n>don't we do partner
running? Let's<n>treat it like a real race and give it our<n>all!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: A race...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka, does starting off with a<n>1,600-meter left-handed
race sound<n>good? I'll go prepare!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, o-okay...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Okay then, then let's do this! Ready,<n>set... GO!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Whoa?! She's already way<n>ahead!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(It's just me on the track. No one<n>else in sight, and all I can
hear is my<n>feet quietly hitting the ground... My<n>favorite
things...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(Then... what's the point of racing? I<n>could just run by
myself forever...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (Why am I... racing?)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka! Coming to Tracen Academy<n>and being able to race
with you has<n>made me so happy!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's why... I won't lose! Yaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah! No way, she passed me...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (No. The lead is... my spot!)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haaah!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whoa, Suzuka! Well, I'm not finished<n>yet!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(She's not backing down! If I don't<n>keep focused, she
could turn this<n>around!)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But I won't... I won't give up my lead!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Waaah?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ...Not yet! Not yeeeeet!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe!

text_block_list.name: Suzuka and Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Phew... Wow, we really ran a lot!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah... We certainly gave it our all.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka? Um, are you okay? It seems<n>like something's
wrong.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah... No, I was just... admiring the<n>view.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (How silly of me. What was I so<n>worried about?)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
First across the finish is Silence<n>Suzuka! That's Silence
Suzuka,<n>showing off her splendid front<n>running!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... pant...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(Competing with everything I have,<n>pushing my limits to
make it to the<n>end...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: This is... the view from the lead!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (Thank you for reminding me... my<n>new friend.)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
You know, Suzuka, you're craaaaazy<n>fast! I'm gonna have
to train a lot<n>more! I'm so pumped!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, yeah? What is it?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... Is it all right if I call you Spe?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh... Yeah! Yeah, of course!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You two!

text_block_list.name: Suzuka and Special Week
text_block_list.text: Aaaaah?! Waaaah?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What are you doing out at a time like<n>this! It's way past
curfew! Get back<n>to your dorms now! Move those feet!

text_block_list.name: Suzuka and Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-yes, ma'am!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hmph. What a handful...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Dear Mom and Mama, student life is<n>way rougher than I
thought it would<n>be. Everyone's so fast, lessons are<n>
difficult, and I'm very busy.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But... I have a dream that I intend to<n>make reality.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Because of that, everything is okay!<n>I'm going to do my
best, together with<n>my friends and classmates!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Someday I'll make my debut, appear<n>in the Twinkle Series...
and then make<n>my dream come true!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'll make you both proud! Love,<n>Special Week.
